modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod enables you to see zombies and dangerous animals through walls. It is not a hack or illegal program, and is made by modding.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod enables you to see [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) and dangerous [animals](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-animals/) through walls. It is not a hack or illegal program, and is made by modding. You can’t play this mod with EAC enabled.

**Texts and icons on the screen:**

In the upper left corner of a screen, it shows the number of enemies near the player, their current activity (idle, investigating, or attacking) and state (flying or running). Also, the distance to the nearest enemy is shown.

The color of off-screen enemy [icon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-icons/) represents an enemy activity.  
**Gray:** Sleeping  
**White:** Idle  
**Yellow:** Investigating  
**Red:** Attacking

**Installing:**

This is a **DMT mod**. It does not work without DMT Modding Tool.

[Download](https://github.com/sjw0687/7dtd-esp-mod/archive/v1.1.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/14318-dmt-esp-wallhack-mod-for-a17/).

**Credits:** fenliux
